adviseScripts.text: Teacher,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: when you were little, what did you want to be?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: A teacher, of course.
Nothing.
I knew you'd say that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: You're like a dependable tree that I can always lean on.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Can I be a little chameleon clinging to your side?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Hehe!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Wow!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I'm shocked to hear you say that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: You just echoed my sentiments exactly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I am still not sure what I want to do going forward.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: It's tough trying to determine your future...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Tia and I both think about what we want our futures to be like.
I ran into Belorta in the cafe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: She said that when it comes to food, the more the better. It doesn't matter what you're eating.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: What do you think, Teacher?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I agree with her 100%.
It's all about quality, not quantity. The taste is what's important.
Hm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I should have expected an answer like that from a big, healthy guy like yourself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: As for me, I tend to focus more on the quality of what I'm eating, not the quantity.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Although I have to say, your answers somehow always have a way of seeming valid...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: This is fantastic.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: We both feel the same on this. It's like we were meant to be together.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Whoops... sorry, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I got a little excited.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I'll try and be better at maintaining my composure in the future.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Tia and I continue to discuss how much is too much when eating.
Naga is in the same class as me,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: but she's so much more mature.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I think that's why I depend on her so much.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Shouldn't you try and be more independent?
I think I know what you mean.
Oof, you really exposed me...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I want to put off living on my own for as long as I can.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: It's lonely being all by yourself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Any chance I could live with you in the future?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I'll consider being less dependent on Naga then.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Hehe!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Sometimes she's like a big sister, then other times she's like my mom.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Her determination is infectious.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Whenever I see her working hard on something, I feel so happy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Tia and I talk about Naga.
Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Are you busy right now?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Yes.
No.
Aww, too bad.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I'll try next time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Bye bye.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I'm joking. I'm not busy.
Ah! I'm glad. Can you go somewhere with me for a bit?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I'll take you somewhere nice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Okay, great.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: There's this dessert event I'm going to, and I need a plus one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Naga says she has something to do after school.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Would you like to join me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Sure, let's go.
Yahoo! Thanks, Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I participate in the dessert event with Tia.
I haven't been too happy about my dessert photos lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: What do you think I'm doing wrong?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I think it's a problem with the focus.
I think it's a problem with the filter.
You think? Let me see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: *Click*
Huh, you're right. It does seem a bit blurry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Ah!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: *Wipe wipe*
*Click*
Much better!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Some whipped cream had gotten smeared on the lens.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: That must be why everything was coming out blurry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Thanks for the help, Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: You mean like a colored filter?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I'd use a red one, but that seems a bit too fiery.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: The yellow one reminds me of oil.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: The blue one makes everything look like food from an alien planet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Hmmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Well, thanks for the suggestion anyway, Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I'll have to find another filter to use.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Tia immerses herself in her photography until the photos come out to her satisfaction.
You see the container I'm always carrying on my back?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: What animal do you think is in the pattern?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: A snake.
A dragon.
Snakes are cute too,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: but this is actually a dragon.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: It's named Epiq.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Epiq?
Yep! It's a nickname I came up with myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I knew you'd be able to tell what it was instantly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Say hello to Epiq!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Epiq?
Yep! It's a nickname I came up with myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: From now on, whenever you see Epiq, be sure to give her a warm welcome.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Tia continues to boast about Epiq for a while.
Whenever I go to the cafe, I order a coffee and some desserts.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Although I have to admit, I usually don't end up drinking much of the coffee, 'cause it's too bitter.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: What about you, Teacher?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I just drink coffee.
I also eat a lot of desserts.
Attractive men with a coffee scent... totally a dream of mine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I should invite you to come to the cafe with me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: You can have a cup of coffee, and I'll have some desserts.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: It'd be a match made in heaven!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: You don't say!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I never thought I'd have a rival dessert fanatic.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I'll have to keep an eye out for you at the cafe and make sure we don't run into each other.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Tia about the cafe.
Teacher, check these animal pictures.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Isn't it adorable?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Which one? The puppy?
Which one? The chameleon?
No, not the puppy! This one!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Tia's finger moves towards the chameleon, which is the furthest thing from cute.
Isn't it lovely?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I just love chameleons!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Yep!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Such vibrant colors. Such a unique appearance.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Those round and expressive eyes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Chameleons are just magical!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I decide to respect Tia's preference for certain animals.
For some reason, my shoulders feel a bit stiff.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Maybe I've been studying too hard?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: You've got to maintain good posture during class.
Maybe it's because you've got such a big heart.
Naga said the same thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I was super tired today, so I was slouching over my desk.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I'll try to sit up straight from now on.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Ha! I don't know what I expected, but certainly not a compliment. You're gonna make me blush.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: So if you've got a big heart, it can actually make your shoulders stiffen up?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I had no idea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I've got to tell Naga about this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I give Tia a light shoulder massage.
A nice cake has to look good. It's even more important than the taste.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Wouldn't you agree?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I agree.
I don't agree.
I figured you would.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: If the outside is appealing enough, then you'll want to eat it up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Of course, what's even more important is that it'll come out looking good in photos.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I suppose most people wouldn't care too much about appearance,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: but still, it's too bad you feel that way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I thought for sure we'd agree on this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Tia and I spend some time talking about our food preferences.
I saw Miss Marciana
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: standing outside of the dessert store.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: What do you think she was doing there?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: She was probably there to buy some desserts.
Maybe she heard some students were hanging out there late at night, and she wanted to check up on them.
Hehe, you're a real joker, Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: There's no way Miss Marciana would be caught dead buying desserts.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I offered her some before, and she practically had a conniption.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: She hates all things sweet with a passion.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I think that's the most likely explanation.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: In that case, I probably shouldn't go to the cafe when it's too late.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Otherwise, Miss Marciana might worry about me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Tia about why Marciana was in front of the dessert store.
Hi, Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: It's good to see you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Tia runs into my arms and gives me a big hug.
Nice to see you.
You shouldn't act like this when we're in public.
Hehe... hehehe...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Wheeee!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Oh, whoops.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Sorry, I forgot again.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Oh, right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Sorry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I always forget when Naga isn't here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I won't do it again.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I give Tia advice on how to be mindful of physical contact.
If I met a dragon on the surface,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: what would I wish for?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Free desserts for life.
Dragons grant wishes?
Whoa, that's a great idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad I asked you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I've gotta write this down before I forget.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Sure they do!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I see it in a cartoon that airs every night.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Aw man, just thinking about it makes my heart flutter.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I have imaginations with Tia about making wishes to a dragon.
It's tough managing a social media account.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: People are always wanting me to collaborate with them for all sorts of ads.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I get lots of people asking me how much I'd be willing to sell my account for.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Some even ask for my personal information.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: That's because you're so pretty.
That's because you take such stunning photos of desserts.
Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: This is a travesty!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: You clearly have never visited my account.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: It's called SWEET_Lover, and there aren't any pictures of my face on it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I only post photos of desserts on there. You should follow me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I'll take it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: That's the best compliment you could have possibly given me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I was feeling down in the dumps, but not any more, thanks to you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Thanks a bunch, Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Tia and I try to come up with hacks that would make running a social media account easier.
I wolfed down 50 desserts at the cafe yesterday.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: You should have seen the owner. They were stunned.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: That's all you ate?
You ate that much?
Yeah, I had to stop before I scared the owner too much.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: It's a real shame, because I could have eaten way more.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: How come you're so surprised?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: You of all people should know that I usually eat way more than that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Looks like I'll have to take you along with me on these cafe excursions.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Tia explains to me how there is a separate stomach for dessert, and another for regular food.
I'm usually not like this with other desserts,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: but every time I see a chocolate fountain,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: this incredible feeling wells up inside me, and I can't control it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: What kind of feeling, exactly?
I think I might know that feeling you're describing.
Something like this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Hehe!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: *Hug*
The feeling I get whenever I hug you nice and tight!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Hehe!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Whenever I set my eyes on a chocolate fountain,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I wanna run over, dunk my head straight in and guzzle down everything in it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I can't help it...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Tia and I both have to keep ourselves from drooling as we envision chocolate fountains.
Hey Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Do you prefer soft or hard objects?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Hard.
Soft.
Me too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: They just feel more reliable in a way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad you feel the same way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Dragon scales must be super hard too, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: It's always nice touching something soft.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Like whenever I hug Naga.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Tia and I have a conversation about touch.
Whenever I think about how my time here at the school is coming to an end,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I get so sad.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Is there any way you can delay it?
Is it because you're worried about your future?
That'd be great if I could,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: but is that even possible?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I'm not entirely sure if it is...
Darn.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Too bad.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Heh, you got me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I should have known I couldn't hide it from you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I have no idea what I'm going to do after graduation.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Well, I'm sure things will work out in the end.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Tia about her happy school days.
I'm jealous of people who get to live with a dog or cat.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: All I can do is stare at photos of the animals I want to have.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: It's so pathetic.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Like that crocodile?
Like that dragon?
That's called a dwarf caiman, to be precise.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Isn't it the cutest thing?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: What I'd give to be able to pat its scales with my hands.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Don't be silly, Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: How could I possibly have a dragon as a pet?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: It'd be way too big to bring into the Ark.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I spend time with Tia talking about pets.
Doesn't Naga look pretty with her hair tied back?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I was thinking of tying my hair back to switch up my image. Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: You're perfect just the way you are.
That'll make you two look like sisters. That oughta be fun.
Hehe...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: You're gonna make me blush.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Thanks, Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Whoa, that'd be great!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: Now I'm definitely gonna do it for sure.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tia

adviseScripts.text: I watch Tia try out all kinds of different hairstyles.
